name: Mystery Mart
description:
Made for Sweet to Sour game jam

Working title: Mystery Mart

State: Demo - Prototype

Engine: UE4.27

Content length: ~30 min.

Endings: 3

TL:DR - You start a job as a cashier and should notice that everything is just a little out of whack.

Controls:

  • [Mouse] to look around
  • [Left Mouse Button] to interact with objects
  • [W] to push items further
  • [S] to pull items closer
  • [ESC] / [P] - pause menu
